tipeeestream.disabled.donators.message: The donators group has been disabled.

tipeeestream.donation.new.message: Thank you very much (name) for the tip of (amount)(currency)!

tipeeestream.donation.newreward.message: Thank you very much (name) for the tip of $(amount) (currency)! Here are (points) (pointname)!

tipeeestream.donations.announce.disable.message: Tips will no longer be announced.

tipeeestream.donations.message.no-name.message: A (name) tag was not provided, at a minimum provide the (name) tag. Tags: (name) (amount) (currency) (message)

tipeeestream.donations.message.success.message: Updated the message for tips when rewards are disabled.

tipeeestream.donations.reward.success.message: The reward for tips has been set to $1 $2 per whole amount of currency donated.

tipeeestream.donations.reward.usage.message: Usage: !tipeeestream rewardmultiplier n.n  Set to 0 to disable

tipeeestream.donations.rewardmessage.no-.message: A (name) tag was not provided, at a minimum provide the (name) tag. Tags: (name) (amount) (currency) (reward) (message)

tipeeestream.donations.rewardmessage.suc.message: Updated the message for tips with rewards enabled.

tipeeestream.donators.min.message: The minimum before being promoted to a Donator was set to $1
